description: 24/7 emergency medical care for life-threatening conditions
preparation: Come immediately for emergencies. Bring all current medications and medical history if possible.

description: Primary care for adults, chronic disease management
preparation: Bring list of medications, symptoms diary if applicable, questions for doctor.
insurance_notes: All major insurance plans accepted. Annual wellness visits covered.

description: Bone, joint, and musculoskeletal system care
preparation: Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Bring details about injury or pain onset.
insurance_notes: Most insurance accepted. Physical therapy may require pre-authorization.

description: Non-emergency acute care for immediate medical needs
preparation: Bring symptom history and current medications. Consider telehealth for minor issues.
insurance_notes: Most insurance accepted. Lower copay than emergency department.
